content: **pattern updated** on june 4 2011 with a tip to avoid the beginning side of openwork looking stretched i recommend you twist =knit through the back loop one stitch before doing/knitting the first yo every round sample shown worked w/o twist jeweled cowl is knitted entirely in the round with some bead/lace work if you are not familiar with how to knit with beads in crochet hook method please see some tutorials available online or you might want to make a *beadless* version instead **pattern clarification ** round 2 knit all putting a bead on every skp st ** of previous round ** except the last one 14 beads per round ------------------------------------------------------------ jeweled cowl was born soon after japan earthquake/tsunami on march 11 2011 if you enjoy the pattern please consider making a donation to the charity of your choice here are some options japanese red cross society 1 american red cross 2 mercy corps 3 thank you for your continued help 1 http //www jrc or jp/english/index html 2 http //www redcross org/ 3 http //www mercycorps org/
